channel.title: blog on Mailund on the Internet
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Mailund on the Internet

item.title: New Books Page
item.description: I have set up a page for the books I have written. Nothing fancy there, it is just a list together with the cover text, but it does collect all my books on one single page.

item.title: New Blog
item.description: Ok, so, I have had a lot of problems with keeping Wordpress and various plugins up to date on my old mailund.dk blog. Considering that I don’t write a whole lot of posts there, I decided that it simply wasn’t worth the effort.
